CustomField.formula: IF( AND( OrderItem__r.Product_Type_Name__c = 'Standard Products', OR( AND( MONTH(Start_date__c) = MONTH(TODAY()), YEAR(Start_date__c) = YEAR(TODAY()) ), AND( MONTH(End_date__c) = MONTH(TODAY()), YEAR(End_date__c) = YEAR(TODAY()) ) ) ), FinalPrice__c, 0 )
CustomField.label: Office Leaving Next Month Total
